addLiquidity(address,address,address,uin.notice: ADD LIQUIDITY WITHOUT ROUTER EXERCISE  The contract has an initial balance of 1000 USDC and 1 WETH.  Mint a position (deposit liquidity) in the pool USDC/WETH to msg.sender.  The challenge is to provide the same ratio as the pool then call the mint function in the pool contract.
